302b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mchog gi thabs dang ni/ /de thob bya ba'i thabs ni rnam mnga' la'ang/ /dngos grub thob par 'dod pa bskyed bar bya/ /don kun grub pa'i mchog ni stsol mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas mchog nyid/ /de yi bdag nyid
303a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba'i sngags tshul dang/ /sna tshogs tshul du gnas pa'i phyag rgya dang/ /lhag par gsang sngags tshul gyi gtso bo ni/ /rgya chen theg pa la ni mos bskyed de/ /sems can mos pa che 'bring chung du la/ /de thob cho
303a2(rgyud 'grel): ga'ang 'bad de nges par bstan/ /rgyal bas 'di dag bskyab pa'i don dgongs pas/ /'gro drug 'khor lo can la'ang ci rigs par/ /gus pa sngon du 'gro bar nges bya ste/ 'di la sems ni dang ba rnam par bskyed/ /de nas gzhan yang
303a3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa mchog la ni/ /sngags mcho ga spyod pa'i 'dul ba'i cho ga shes/ /bde gshegs sras kyi spyod pa'i rjes 'jug cing/ /bla med sngags kyi tshul la 'jug par bya/ /sbyor ba phun tshogs bsgrub par gyur ba dang/ /dbang bskur
303a4(rgyud 'grel): thob cing rjes su shes pa dang/ /gzhan don bsgrub la gcig tu gzhol gyur pas/ /bla ma mthong na gus pas phyag bya'o/ /ston pa bzhin du rab dang gus bskyed cing/ /dge ba'i shes dang mdza' bo mchog bzhin blta/
303a5(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mos pa'i khyad par bskyed nas ni/ /de mnyes byas te de nas de rjes spyad/ /rjes su brtse phyir de la mngon phyogs shing/ /bsnyen bkur dag gis yid ni mgu bar bya/ /btud de mgon po de dbang byas bdag la/ /stsol zhes
303a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bshegs spyod mchog gsol ba gdab/ /thugs rje 'byung sogs dkyil 'khor bzang por ni/ /cho gas dkyil 'khor mchog der zhugs nas su/ /dam tshig dam pa ci rigs blangs nas su/ /rang sngags phyag rgya dag tu bcas pa ni/ /
303a7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma mngon du gyur las yang dag mnod/ /dam tshig mchog tu sgrub cing bsrung ba dang/ /'phel bar bya ba la yang rjes dpag bya/ /de la tshul 'di las ni ston pa yi/ /gsang sngags spyod mchog dam tshig yang dag gzung/ /blo chung
303b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la brtse phyir bshad pa ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin rim bzhin rnam par dbye/ /bcom ldan kun la phan don mchog mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras mchog dang/ /de'i sngags dang phyag rgya lha rnams dang/ /theg mchog sngags kyi
303b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul la khyad par du'o/ /sngags kyi don la 'jug byed bla ma la'ang/ /gus min mi bya brnyas pa'ang bya ba min/ /gzhan don phun tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas la sogs yongs su spang mi bya/ /bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan sngon 'gro bas
303b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran pa'ang rgyun du bstan par bya/ /mnyes par bya zhing dad pas mchod pa la/ /ci rigs par ni rjes su spyad par bya/ /rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos dang/ /de yi tshul du bstan pa'i chos rnams dang/ /bslab pa rab ster slob dpon bla ma
303b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan/ /tshangs par spyod par bcas la'ang bsnyas mi bya/ /de rnams la ni rim 'gro ci rigs par/ /dus dang dus rtag tu ni bya ba yin/ /gang yang byis pa'i chos kyi spyod pa dang/ khong khro'ang sangs rgyas la sogs bya ba min/ /gang phyir 'jig
303b5(rgyud 'grel): rten don mdzad spyod mdzad pas/ /mdo las khong khro don chen 'joms gsungs te/ /sems bskyed gcig gis bskal pa bye bar ni/ /byas pa ma lus 'joms pa byed par gsungs/ /de bas phung khrol gnas dang rtsad gyur pa/ /khro ba 'bad
303b6(rgyud 'grel): de rnam par spang bar bya/ /byang chub sems ni rin chen mchog gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i phun tshogs dang/ /rang don gzhan don phun tshogs rgyur gyur cing/ /the tshom nges par 'jig pa'i mdza' gcig bu/ /de ni srog
303b7(rgyud 'grel): pas lhag par bsrung bya zhing/ /bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan gang yin bsgom/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sems can la/ /gnod par 'gyur ba chung duAng rnam par spang/ /gzhan du de la phan pa'i don 'gyur phyir/ /snying rje bskyed de khro
304a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bstan par bya/ /gnod chen byed la'ang sems can la 'cho ba/ /rnam spang bzod la'ang rtag tu dga' bar bya/ /snying rje byams dang dga' ba'i sems dang ni/ /btang snyoms dang yang ldan par bsgom par bya/ /chos
304a2(rgyud 'grel): dang zang zing mi 'jigs sbyin pa ni/ /ci rigs 'gro don bsgrub pa nyid du bya/ /don chen bsgrub dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dus gzhan dag tu btang snyoms nyid du bya/ /'gro la phan pa'i don ni mi nus na/ /byang chub sems ni cho ga bzhin du
304a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /der ni chos rnams thams cad 'dus 'gyur cing/ /rtag tu dkar zhing rnam par dag par bshad/ /sbyin sogs sdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis kyang/ /sems can yang dag bsdus te theg mchog la/ /nges sbyar 'dzin dang klas
304a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba dang/ /de don sgom zhing bsam par bya ba yin/ /mkhas pas mig sogs drug po des gzung zhing/ /mnyam gzhag yid ni zhi zhing sbas par bya/ /gang phyir chang ni don kun 'jig byed cing/ /mi dge kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pas spang/
304a5(rgyud 'grel): dag dang mtshon dang lce 'bab lta bu'i sems/ /de ni shin tu ring ba 'ang spang bar bya/ /mdor na bdag dang gzhan don 'jig pa gang/ /de ni rab tu rgyang bsrings spang bar bya/ /mal khri mchog lnga rnam par spang bya ste/ /rgyal bas de ni
304a6(rgyud 'grel): dregs gnas yin par gsungs/ /tshul mchog yang dag dam pa rim bzhin du/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa 'di yin te/ /'di ni rnam dpye rab rgyas nges pa yi/ /gtso bos mdo sde la sogs gsungs pa yin/ /de ltar yang
304a7(rgyud 'grel): dag dam tshig la gnas pa'i/ /de nyams 'gyur rgyu rnam par spang bya ste/ /sems ngan le lo dran pa brjed pa dang/ /skye bo ngan pa 'dres pa rtag tu spang/ /de ltar yang dag dam tshig gnas pa yi/ /sngags mchog spyod sgem byang chub
304b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa yi/ /rgyun du sgrib pa rnams ni zad phyir dang/ /bsod nams la sogs tshogs rnams rnam 'phel phyir/ /tshe 'di nyid du gsang sngags grub par ni/ /ji ltar 'gyur zhes rnam par bsam byas la/ /de bsgrub don du rung bar bdag mthong nas/ /bla ma
304b2(rgyud 'grel): las ni rim pa yang dag mnod/ /ji skad bshad rig cho ga'i rim gyis ni/ /de nas gsang sngags la sogs spyod la sbyar/ /bla ma phyag byas bdag nyid dbang bskur nas/ /sngags don legs par bsgrub phyir gsol ba gdab /blo ldan bla mas gnang
304b3(rgyud 'grel): thar byas nas ni/ /rjes su mthun pa'i yul du gnas par bya/ /sna tshogs ri dang ri sul dag dang ni/ /phug dang nags tshal rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /bde ba thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas rnams dang/ /pad+ma utpal kha byes brgyan pa dang/ /chu bo chu bran chu
304b4(rgyud 'grel): mig mang ba dang/ /skye bo la sogs 'dus pa rnam spangs shing/ /yid 'ong shing gi yal gar ldan pa dang/ /gang na yam shing ku sha la sogs mang/ /sbrang ma tsha grang la sogs rnams dang bral/ /gang na stag dang seng+ge med pa dang/ /gang zhig sangs
304b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sangs rgyas sras mchog gi /gnas gyur sngon ni bsten par mdzad pa dang/ /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas gyur pa/ /yid ni dga' bar legs par gnas par bya/ /'bad de 'dod las sems pa rnams bzlog cing/ /khyim pa rab byung
304b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dre ba rnam spangs te/ /chos la shin tu dga' ba bskyed nas ni/ /sems ni dngos grub la 'dod spro ba bskyed/ /blo ni shin tu spro bar ldan pa dang/ /bkres skom ngal la sogs pas mi zhum par/ /'tsho ba rnam dag grogs bzang grogs med par/ /dam
304b7(rgyud 'grel): chos glegs bam gnyis pa nyid la brtag /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la rjes 'jug cing/ /sngags mchog theg la'ang mos pa brtan pa dang/ /spro ba dang ni blo mchog stobs ldan zhing/ /brtan ldan dgos pa la ni bltos med sems/ /snying stobs
305a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing rab brtse'i rjes su 'jug /mthong ba'i chos la rang gzhan don bsgrub la/ /lha gzhan brten par mi byed 'jig med pa/ /de ni grog po yin par yongs su bsgrags/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i bslab pa'i gnas bstan pa
305a2(rgyud 'grel): ste le'u dang po'o// //gnas byas der ni sgrub pa po de yis/ /dbang po brtan pas da ni nyin re zhing/ /thog mar ram sngar gnas ma la las langs nas/ /des ni bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus bsal/ /mtshan mo bag med nyes
305a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nad bar ni/ /'bang de chog de bzhin bshegs la 'jug /dpang po zhi zhing phan sems snying rje can/ /'gro ba ma lus gdon pa'i ying gcig ldan/ /khrus kyi cho ga bzhin du khrus byas pa'am/ /rang gi lus dang ngag sems rnam dag pas/ /
305a4(rgyud 'grel): gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa yi phyogs su ni/ /me tog la sogs chal par legs bkram par/ /ras ris la sogs dam chos glegs bam bdun/ /yang na phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i mgon po bsam/ /de nas mkhas pas shar la sogs bltas
305a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /yid kyis mngon sum bzhin du bsams nas ni/ /dad par gcig tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis ni/ /'dud pa'i sbyor bas yan lag lngas phyag bya/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dus gsum 'khrungs shing sku mchog
305a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum mnga' ba/ /tshul gyi rab mchog theg chen chos dar ni/ /de bzhin byang chub thugs ldan dge 'dun mchog /rig pa'i tshogs dang gsang sngags tshogs rnams dang/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams 'dus tshogs mthar phyin la/ /brjod kyis
305a7(rgyud 'grel): mi lar sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang lus ngag sems dag pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya pAkci t+ta pA da bandanAM ka ro mi zhes phyag 'tshal ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /sdig las ldog pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar te/ /pus mo g.yas
305b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha nga sar gcugs nas/ /sdig pa'i tshogs rnams bsags pa bshags bgyi ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par rmongs sems kyis/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang byas dang/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs bcas la gang byas/ /srog
305b2(rgyud 'grel): chags tshogs gtogs gzhan la'ang gang byas dang/ /gang yang pha ma slob dpon ston pa la/ /thog med 'khor ba'i 'gro bar gtogs pa yi/ /byas pa'i nyes byas mi bzad ma lus 'di/ /gang zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams
305b3(rgyud 'grel): na/ /bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar bshags par bgyi/ /oM sarba pA paM spho Ta da ha na badzri Na swAhA/ /sdig bsal ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /sku gsum mnga' ba'i dus gsum sangs rgyas dang/ /chos rnams kun dang byang chub sems mchog dang/ /
305b4(rgyud 'grel): gang yang phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i ston pa la/ /de la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su mchi/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twaM/ sha ra NaM gats+tshA mi badzra d+ha rma h+rI:/ skyabs su 'gro ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid/ /zhing las
305b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i lus kyi rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /skyon med bdag nyid rnam par dag pa yi/ /bdag nyid bde gshegs kun la dbul bar bgyi/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya At+ta naM/ nirya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA tha ta shU a d+hi ti Sh+Tha na taM/ sarba ta hA ga ta dz+nyA
305b6(rgyud 'grel): na ma me/ A bi sha tu/ bdag dbul ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /skye sogs sdug bsngal rnams kyis nye gces shing/ /mi shel log pas nyer bcom bdag nyid can/ /srog chags rnams la phyag phyir byang chub sems/ /rin chen mchog gyur bdag gis bskyed
305b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi/ /rtag tu srog chags rnams kyi skyabs dang ni/ /gnas dang dbung gnyen skyob ba nyid gyur cig /oM bo db+hi tsi ta taM udwA ta ya mi/ sarba b+ha ba bi ga ska nd+ha d+hA twA ya ta na grA hya/ grA ha ke shtsa bi brji taM/ d+ha rma ne rAt+mAM sa ma ta/ yA swa tsi/ mA dya? nu ru ta hUM
306a1(rgyud 'grel): shu n+ya tA swa b+h+rA baM ya thA te/ bud+d+ha b+ha ga badb+hi:/ po d+hi sa twai:/ yA badA d+hi ma N+Da nad bo d+hi tsi t+ta mutpa ti taM ta thA haM sa a bi bo d+hi tsi t+ta u tpad ya mi/ byang chub sems kyi sbyor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' 
306a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sna tshogs thabs mkhas pa yis ban mdzad dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang dag gzhan/ /bsod nams byed pa de la yi rang ngo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na/ a nu mo da na pU da me gta sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rjes su
306a3(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /'gro ba'i skyabs gyur pa la gsol ba ni/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed thams cad la/ /chos kyi spra ni las char chen dbab tu gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a
306a4(rgyud 'grel): dta thA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bskul ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /so so skye bo'i se dang nyes byas rnams/ /ma lus par ni myur du spangs nas ni/ /skyon med chos kyi sku ni rnam dag par/ /bshad pa myur du rtogs pa nyid mdzod cig /oM
306a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta na/ a de sha ye me/ sarba satwa he twar thA ya/ d+ha rma d+ha to/ s+thI tir bta ba tu/ gsol ba gdab pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /sems can thams cad la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis dge ba gang dag ci bsags pa/ /skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal
306a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni/ /nye bar zhi phyir bdag gis bsngo bar bgyi/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya ni rya ta ya mo/ pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra sa ma ye hUM/ bsngo pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /nus pa la bltos gang cung zad/ /phyag la sogs pa gang byas pa/ /bya ba de ni dag phyir
306a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rang gzhan rjes su gzung phyir ro/ /de ltar sems kyi 'jug pa rnam dag pas/ /ji ltar rigs par skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba'i rgya bcings nas/ /lus dang ngag dang yid ni rnam par sbyang/ /de la 'di'i
306b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ni/ /kun gyis gsungs pa las shes bya/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /mthe bong gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /yan lag kun la mnyam sbyar te/ /gsang sngags 'di yang brjod par bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ /bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): oM a sa me tri
306b2(rgyud 'grel): sa me sa ma ye swA hA/ /'di'i cho ga ni lan gsum du brjod do/ /rgyad gsungs phyag rgya gzhan gyi yang/ /mtshan nyid rim pa gang yin pa/ /gsang sngags bsgrub la brtson pa yi/ /sngags spyod pa yi shes par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis
306b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams ni spyong byed yin/ /sa dang pha rol phyin bskong zhing/ /chos gsum lam gyi mtshams 'dzin pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings las yang dag dbyung/ /de bas phyag rgya nges par bcing/ /lus dang ngag yid rnam par dag /rang gi lus ni
306b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs bsgyur phyir/ /lag pa dag ni gnyi ga yang/ /khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong sba/ /mdzub gnyis bsgreng bar byas pa 'di/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /chos dbyings rnam sbyong phyag rgya'o/ /de yi sngags ni 'di yin te/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/
306b5(rgyud 'grel): d+ha rma d+hA tu swa b+ha ba At+ma ko nya haM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang/ /rang gi lus ni mnyam bsams te/ /mthar ni tshig ni 'di dag kyang/ /lan gsum brjod de sbyar bar bya/ /dper na rdul med nam mkha' bzhin/ /chos kyi sku la gnas par mthong
306b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis byin brlabs sngags pa ni/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi mthu nyid yin/ /brtan par bya ba'i rgyu ru ni/ /rdo rje'i ngo bor rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di bcings nas/ /gsang sngags 'di yang brjod par bya/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab sprad de
306b7(rgyud 'grel): sor mo thams cad kun bsnod la mthe bong gnyis bzlog ste sprad par bya'o/ /rgyal mchog dpal dang ldan pa 'di/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su bsgrags/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis/ /'khor lo rab tu 'di bskor ro/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i
307a1(rgyud 'grel): mthun dag kyang/ /de ltar sgrub pa pos mngon na/ /rtag tu 'khor lo sgyur 'dra zhing/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor byed/ /de la phyag rgya de'i gsang sngags ni 'di yin te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA NAM/ badzra A t+ma ko nya haM/ rdo rje sems dpa' 
307a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dra zhes/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdung tshogs kyis/ /mthong bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /cho ga bzhin du go bgos te/ /rang lus 'od zer 'bar ba yi/ /rdo rje go cha
307a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /bgegs dang log 'dren mi zad dang/ gang gzhan sdig pa'i sems ldan pas/ /rdo rje lta bur de mthong nas/ /bdug pa'i bdag nyid can rnams 'byer/ /de la 'di'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te/ /thal mo sbyar nas mdzub
307a4(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis kyis phyir rol nas dkris la/ /mthe bong gnyis gzhar ba ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra'a NAM/ oM badzra ka ba tsa hUM/ yi ge ra ni kha dog dkar/ /theg le yis ni rnam brgyan pa/ /dpa' bos gtsug gi nor bu bzhin/ /de
307a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rang gi spyi bor bsam/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM raM/ gal te sdig pa'i las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgya ni bsags gyur kyang/ /nyis pa thams cad byad 'gyur zhing/ /bsod nams ye shes dag kyang rdzogs/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags 'di ni/ /
307a6(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa thams cad zad byed pa/ /mi ldog pa yi sa dag kyang/ /'di yis myur du thob par byed/ /kha dog dmar shing shas cher 'bar/ /'od zer 'bar 'bar 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /smos pa'i bya ba thams cad la/ /'di nyid nges par sbyar
307a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de nas bgegs ni gzhig pa'i phyir/ /bsrung chen 'di ni dran byas te/ /mi bzad ces pa'i bsrung ba 'di/ /bgegs chen zlog par byed pa yin/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hya:/ sarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba thA haM khaM
307b1(rgyud 'grel): sakA? ma hA ga le/ sarba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya ni rdzA te/ hUM hUM tra Ta h+ra Ta/ a pra ti ha te swAhA/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang/ /srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams/ /'di ni dran pa tsam gyis su/ /de dag thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa dag
307b2(rgyud 'grel): nga spel pa dang/ /bsrung ba bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //de ltar bdag nyid legs par sbyangs nas ni/ /rang gi sngags kyi bdag po'i mdun bsams la/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas cho ga bzhin spyan drang/ /de la dang por dam tshig
307b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya bcas pas bgegs rnams bsal/ /phyag byas cho ga bzhin du mchod yon dbul/ /gsang sngags mchog gi gdan yang bstab par bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas
307b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' mchog /brangs? 'das rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba bsam/ /'phags pa mi g.yo mgon gyis sngar bsangs shing/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas bskrad dang sbyang ba dang/ /rang rang sngags kyis rnam par byin brlabs pa'i/ /me tog
307b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs mchod pas de 'og mchod/ /de la go rim 'di yin te/ /'od zer 'bar bas khyab pa'i mchog /nyi ma 'char ka lta bu'i mdog /yi ge ra ni thig ler bcas/ /rgyas par mdun du bsam par bya/ /rdul dang bral zhes 'di yin ni/ /sgra yi de
307b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid rnam bsam la/ /chos kun 'dod chags la sogs pa'i/ /rdul bral yin zhes brjod par bya/ /sems kyi sa ni dag pa'i bdag /de 'og sa la 'jug par bya/ /zug rngu'i nyes pa rnams sbyangs 'di/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar sbyar bar bya/ /mnyam par
307b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i sa de ni/ /rdo rje lta bur yang dag gnas/ /sa yi 'og gzhir legs gnas pa'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam pa ni/ /'od zer nag po 'phro bcas pa'i/ /yi ge has ni legs mnan pa'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA NA haM/ de nas de'i steng chu'i
308a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ /shel dang 'dra ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /yi ge bas ni legs mnan pa'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+hA nAM baM/ /de nas chu'i steng gnas pa'i/ /gser gyi sa gzhi bsgom pa ni/ /gru bzhi kha dog ser por snang/ /dang po'i/ /
308a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ges legs mnan pa'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM a/ dkyil 'khor btso ma'i gser 'dra la/ /'od zer gser gyi mdeg 'dra pa/ /kun nas rnam par 'phro ba ni/ /dbang chen zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa yi/ /
308a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs gnas de ltar bsams nas ni/ /dze nas pad+ma bsam byas te/ /yu ba rdo rje yis las byung/ /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis sbras/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /kha bye 'od zer mang por ldan/ /pad+ma bye bas yongs bskor ba'o/ /de
308a4(rgyud 'grel): nas de steng gang na chen po/ /seng+ges gteg par bsam par bya/ /de nas gzhal yas khang chen te/ /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /brgyan pa'i ka bas bteg pa dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnams kyis khyab/ /mu tig dra ba sogs
308a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan/ /rin chen tshun 'phyang rnams kyis spud/ /me tog sbyin ni bzang pos g.yogs/ /dri dang spos kyis phan tshun khyab/ /me tog la sogs tshogs rnams ni/ /nye 'khor kun tu bab par gyur/ /der ni glu bar rol mo rnams/ /mong na
308a6(rgyud 'grel): par dga' ba'i yon tan 'bar/ /rin chen bum pa mchod yon snad/ /gzhal yas khang bzang de ru bsam/ /rin chen shing la sogs bas brgyan/ /nor bu'i 'od kyis rnam par gsal/ /ting 'dzin gzungs dang sa dang ni/ /dbang sogs
308a7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams kyis bstan/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin sogs dang/ /byang chub yan lag me tog 'bar/ /gar byed rol mo brdung pa dang/ /yid phrog snyan pa'i glu dang ldan/ /mgon ngo bdag gi bsod stobs dang/ /sangs rgyas byin brlabs
308b1(rgyud 'grel): gzi can dang/ /de bzhin chos dbyings stobs kyis ni/ /mchod pa yang dag gnas gyur cig /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa ma khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba thA khaM/ u ngda te spa ra na hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ /'di'i cho ga ni lan mang du brjod pa yin no/ /'di yis byin
308b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs na kun/ /slar yang log par 'gyur ma yin/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo las sor bar/ /phan tshun bcar 'di byin rlong rgya/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing/ /gzod nas zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /de nyid 'di ni bsam nas su/ /yi ge
308b3(rgyud 'grel): a ni de ru dgod/ /yi ge a de gyur pa las/ /thub chen rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /'od kyi phreng ba rnam par 'gyed/ /sems can khams ni dpag med pa/ /bsam pa ji bzhin bskul mdzad pa/ /'jig rten
308b4(rgyud 'grel): khams ni stong phrag bcu/ /dkyil 'khor rgya cher khyab par mdzad/ /sku gsung thugs ni thams cad du/ /rtag par gnas pa'i thugs dang ldan/ /dpa' bo 'dzam+bu'i gser 'dra zhing/ /kun tu snang bar mdzad pa po/ /dpa' bo'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /
308b5(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin bzhugs nyes pa bcom/ /stod g.yog dang dkar la man bas shing/ /ral pa thong tshugs dag gis brgyan/ /yang na 'dir ni ra bkod la/ /skyes mchog shAkya thub pa bsam/ /dpa' bo chos gos man bas pa dang/ /mtshan mchog sum
308b6(rgyud 'grel): cu gnyis mnga' ba'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+dpA? nA ra/ gnas ni yongs su gyur pa dang/ /de bzhin 'jig rten snang mdzad de/ /sku gcig dang ni gnyis nyid dam/ /sku kun dang ni rjes su ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas 'jug pa dang/ / 'byung ba 'ang de bzhin bsam
308b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das g.yas kyi pad+ma la/ /rang rig lha mo bgod par bya/ /g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /bzhugs par yang ni bsam par bya/ /nye 'khor pad+ma gzhan dag la/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshoT chen po/ gzhan gyi don ni mdzad par
309a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson/ /mi ldog tshogs ni blo yis bsam/ /de nas g.yas kyi 'og logs su/ /zlos pa de ni rnam par dag /yang na de dbus 'jam dbyangs sogs/ /yi ge yongs su gyur pa yi/ /gnas la de ni rim bzhin du/ /rnam par
309a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya ba yin/ /de la 'di'i yi ge'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nA maM/ spyan ras gzigs sam rdo rje sems/ /byams pa dang ni bzang zhes bya/ /rnam par sems lam sa nyid dam/ /spyan dang na bza' dkar mo dang/ /sgrol ma khro gnyer
309a3(rgyud 'grel): can nyid dang/ /mA ma kI dang lu gu rgyad/ /'khor los spyar dang rta mgrin dang/ /gnod mdzes dran pho dran mo dang/ /khro bo pho nya pho nya mo/ /tshogs dang rgyal po rgyal mo dang/ /yongs su gyur pa'i cho ga yis/ /ci 'dod par ni bsam par bya/ /de nas dang
309a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dga' ba'i phyir/ /phyi ma lma? tog la sogs tshogs/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs pa/ /chos ga bzhin du yongs su brtag /mi g.yo bas ni yongs spyang zhing/ bsad dang bskrad dang sbar ba dang/ /yongs su bzlas te phyin brlabs la/ /
309a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs pas/ /mtshams dang phyogs dang nam mkha' bcing/ /de nas rang rang phyag rgya dang/ /sngags kyis spyan ni drang bar bya/ /yang na spyi yi gsang sngags kyi/ /sbyor ba 'di dang ldan par
309a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de la 'di ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya yin te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na spho Ta ya hUM traT haM maM/ 'di'i cho ga ni lan gsum du brjod pa'o/ /phyag rgya ni lag po g.yon pa khu tshung bcangs la/ mjub mo dang gung
309a7(rgyud 'grel): mo brkyang la/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi rtse mo mthe bos mnan la lag pa g.yas pa de bzhin du ral gri lta bur byas la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i lag thil du bcug ste/ ral gri shubs su bcug pa las drangs pa lta bu ni mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya
309b1(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ de kun tu ba skor la me tog la sogs pa yang de nyid kyis reg par byas na/ bskad pa la sogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri shur sa nas drangs la bskrad ba la g.yon phyogs zhas bskor te phyi rol tu tsha dam bya ba bstan par bya'o/ /phyogs dang
309b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bcengs pa ni g.yas nas bskor bar bya'o/ /bya ba gzhan dang gzhan dag dang/ /mi zad 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang/ /bgags la sogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /'di dag nyid ni nges par sbyar/ /de nas spyan drang pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i
309b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba bya ste/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rang gi dam tshig nyid kyis spyon/ /de la 'di'i cho ga ni/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a ba sarba tra a phra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga ta oM ku sha/ bo d+hi tsadya/ pa ri pU ra ka swAhA/ 'di'i cho ga ni lan bdun brjod ba'o/ /
309b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la/ khu tshur byas nye lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ste/ tshigs gsum bkug la lhag ma gdu bu'i tshul du bzhag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /'di ni lcags kyu yin
309b5(rgyud 'grel): par bshad/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /gang gzhan gdug pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /thams cad 'dis ni 'gugs par byed/ /de nas sdugs dang phyag rgya dang/ /ldan par dam tshig bstan byas te/ /ston pa
309b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya ji skad bshad pa bcing/ /na mthus man+ta bud+d+ha nA/ a sa me tri sa me sa ma ye swAhA/ 'di'i cho ga ni lan gsum rab tu brjod pa yin no/ /de ltar dam tshig yang dag bstan byas pas/ /'gro la phan mdzad rnams ni chom
309b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /sngags dang rig pa'i lha mchog dgyes pa'i phyir/ /dgongs pa mdzad cing dam pa stsol bar 'gyur/ /de nas mchod yon sngar gyi cho ga dang/ /rang sngags phyag rgya'i cho gar yang dag ldan/ /rnam dag bde bdag gshegs par gtogs
310a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /rgyal sras rnams la dag phyir dbul bar bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na sa mas ma swAhA/ 'di'i chog ni lan nyi shu rtsa lnga brjod pa yin no/ /'di'i phyag rgya ni mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya yin no/ /de nas sngags
310a2(rgyud 'grel): bas gdan gyi ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan byas te/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ /thams cad nyid la sbyar bar bya/ /byang chub mchog dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /gang du bzhugs par shes pa dang/ /de tshe zlos pas gdan thob phyir/ /de phyir
310a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dbul bar bya/ /de la 'di yi cho ga ni/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM a/ /'di'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te sor mo rnams kun tu brkyang la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ dril bu lta bur byas la mdzub mo
310a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gung mo gnyis dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya'/ /'di ni par mchog dpal dang ldan/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gang na bzhugs par shes gyur pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gang na chen yin/ /de nas bdun pa'i blo can zlog byed pa/ /mi
310a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo gsang sngags ral gri'i rgyang bcas bskul/ /rta yi mchog ltar mi zad 'di mthong nas/ /lus tshig ba ltar rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): samta badzra NAM/ tsanD mahA ro Sha Na spho Ta ya/ tra ga hUM maM/ blo dang ldan pas 'di dag thams cad
310a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rnam sbyang rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ru/ /cho ga bzhin bsams de yi gsang sngags dang/ /phyag rgya'i cho gas yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra NOM ba 'di'i cho ga ni yan lag thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshes rnams tshig la dral
310a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o zhes/ /de nyid rnam par bsam bya zhing/ /phyag rgyar yang dag ldan pas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni 'di'i phyag rgya yin te/ lag pa gnyis 'bu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis brkyang ste sbyar la/ /mdzub mo gnyis
310b1(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste ngom la sbyang nas rdo rje lta bur bya'o/ /mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis ni gyen du bsgrengs nas bzhag la/ srin lag gnyis nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /sngags ni/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra taM/ tsanra mahA ro Sha Na hUM/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs
310b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rdo rje phyag rgya sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya yang sbyor ba 'dis bya'o/ /kun tu rdo rje'i go cha ni/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du bsam/ /sngar bshad go cha'i spyor ba ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgya des par sbyar/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa
310b3(rgyud 'grel): man+ta badzra NAM/ badzra ka ba ca hUM phyag rgya ni thal mo khor stong du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis rgyab nas bkris te/ mthe bong gnyis gung mo gnyis la gzhar ba ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o/ /yi ge kha ni thig ler bcas/ /rang gi spyi bor yang dag bsam/ /chos
310b4(rgyud 'grel): kun mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes/ /de nyid rnam pas bsam par bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM kham/ de nas mnyam par bzhag nas su/ /bdud rnams skrag byed phyag rgya ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas kun nas bskor bar bya/ /gang gzhan sdang
310b5(rgyud 'grel): bar sems dpa' yi/ /mi bzang 'jigs pas sa gzhi de/ /rdo rje me ni 'bar ba rung/ /me thong nas rnam par 'byed par 'gyur/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ ma hA ba la ba ti/ /nga sha pa le te badzod b+ha be/ ma hA mai trya b+hyud ga te swAhA/ phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur
310b6(rgyud 'grel): bcangs la/ mdzub mo brkyang/ dbral bar khro gnyer bsdu bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /bdud ni rnam par bsdigs shes bya/ /phung byed thams cad 'jig par byed/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su/ /
310b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud sde shin tu ma zad dang/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang/ /the tshom med par rab tu 'byer/ /des ni mi bzad bcings nas su/ /mtshams bcing pa ni nges par sbyar/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pas kyang/ /shin tu bzod bka' skye
311a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ /sarba tyA nu ga te/ band+ha sI man ma hA sa ma ya/ ni rdzA te smar Ni/ a pri ti ha te b+ha ka Dha ka tsa ra tsa ra/ band+ha band+ha/ da shan di shan/ sarba ta thA ga ta a nu dz+nyA te/ pra ba ra d+ha rma la ba d+hi dza le/
311a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ba ti bi kurbi ku le li la pu ri swAhA/ /yang na ma 'dir bsdus pa'i sngags 'di sbyar te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ be l+lu pu ri bi ku dbi ku ye swAhA/ /'di'i cho ga ni lan bdun bya ba yin no/ /phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la/ mdzub
311a3(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis nang du gzhug /mthe 'od? gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bskum la/ srin lag phye ste gyen du bsgreng/ /gung mo gnyis de bzhin du sbyar ba ni mtshams chen po gcod pa yin no/ /'di phyogs bcur bskor na mtshams chen po bcad pa
311a4(rgyud 'grel): byas par 'gyur ro/ /bsrung dang phyogs bcings la sogs pa/ /'di dag las ni gcig gis kyang/ /gang phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu/ /nges par bsrung ba nus pa yin/ /yang na mi g.yo dpa' bo yis/ /bdag bsrung gnas ni sbyang ba dang/ /
311a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams dang phyogs bcing la sogs pa'i/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba yin/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA NIM taM/ de nas gus pa dam pa sngon 'gro bas/ /dad pas slar yang mchod yon dbul bya zhing/ /de nas dri la sogs pa des bstan
311a6(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya/ /de nas 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar sbyar ba yi/ /dri yi chu yis kun tu ni/ /bsang bar bya ba yang dag sbyar/ /mchod pa'i yan lag dri sogs la/ /de'i sngags
311a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis yang dang yang/ /gsang sngags yongs su bzla ba dang/ /de nas rang rang sngags kyis so/ /de nas mkhas bas rang gi ni/ /rig pa bzlas la dbul bya ste/ /dri 'di zhes ni brjod bya zhing/ /so so'i ming gis dbul bar bya/ /chos dbyangs
311b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge dgod pa ni/ /thams cad las ni ched star bya/ /de la 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta durd+hA? nAM/ raM/ de la dri la sogs pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM bi shud+d+ha gand+hod b+ha bA ya swAhA/ /dri'i sngags te 'di'i cho ga
311b2(rgyud 'grel): ni lan gsum brjod pa'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bu d+d+ha nAM/ /oM ma ha me h+ryar b+hU ta ga te swAhA/ me to gi sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM d+harma hA twa nu ga te swAhA bdud spos kyi sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta b+hud+d+hA nAM/ oM ta thA ga tA rtsi spang na/ a ba b+hAs
311b3(rgyud 'grel): ga gno rA dya swAhA/ mar le'i? sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta dud+d+ha nAM/ sarba thA khaM ung+ga te spha ra na hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ sta bshos kyi sngags so/ /mchod pa'i yan la gzhan dang gzhan dag 'byor bar gyur na yang/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas rang tu sbyangs
311b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid dang cho ga 'di nyid kyis dngul thang bya'o/ /de la thal mo khong stong du sbyang te/ sor mo ban tshun du cung zed bsnol ba ni thams cad dri la sogs pa spyi'i phyag rgya yin no/ /mkhas pas spos sogs med na ni/ /dad pas yid kyis dbul bya ste/ rnam
311b5(rgyud 'grel): dag yin du 'ong ba yi/ /yid kyi cho ga'ang bya ba yin/ /zhing khams 'di 'am gzhan dag na/ /lha dang mi yi gang yin pa'i/ /spos dang me tog la sogs pas/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam dang /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /bsod
311b6(rgyud 'grel): nams ye shes las byung ba'i/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang/ /gzhal yas khang sogs chen po dang/ /lha'i rin chen shing sogs ni/ /yo byad thams cad ldan pa dang/ /de bzhin dri sogs sprin gyis ni/ /nam mkha' i gtos kun yang dag dgang/ /
311b7(rgyud 'grel): dri sogs sprin gyi char 'bab pa'i/ /mchod pa kun tu legs bsams te/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas rnams la/ /kun nas legs par mchod bya ba/ /byin rlob sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /de nas de ni dbul bar bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo yi shwa
312a1(rgyud 'grel): mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba thA ud+ga? te spha ra Na hi maM ga ga na swAhA/ /phyag rgya ni byin gyis rlob pa'i phyag rgya nyid yin te/ 'di'i cho ga ni lan bdun gyi bar du bya ba yin no/ /'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/ mgon po bdag gi bsod nams kyi
312a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dus thams cad du rnyed bar sla zhing/ rgya che la yongs su dag pa'i mchod pa chen po'i bkod pa'i sprin 'byung ba sangs rgyas dang
312a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di yi gang cung zad/ /bsod nams tshogs ni legs bsags pa/ /des na bdag ni 'gro kun gyi/ /don byed gsang sngags grub
312a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /de skad sngags spyod rnam dag phyir/ /bsam pa thag pas brjod par bya/ /gang zhig sgrib pa dag phyir dang/ /tshogs rnams yongs su bskang pa'i phyir/ /sngags kyi cho ga 'di sbyar ba/ de la des pa'ang gang na med/ /cho ga la sogs
312a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dang/ /gnas dang dus kyi cho ga yang/ /tshe 'dir dngos grub thob 'dod phyir/ /gang zhig gsang sngags la brtson ba/ /de'i bsnyen chog 'ang sngon du ni/ yid kyi cho ga bya ba yin/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga bzhin rdzogs nas/ /zla ba gcig gi 'og tu ni/
312a6(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /sngags kyi bsnyen pa bya ba yin/ /de nas dngos grub myur du thob par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje glu'i bstod pa'i mchog 'di yis de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams la mchod par bya ba yin no/ /mnyam nyid mi
312a7(rgyud 'grel): g.ye mnyam nyid mchog chos can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /yon tan kun mnyam mdza' yas dngos grub stsol/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog rab chos/ /sems can khams la rtag mchog dngos grub stsol/ /
312b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mnyam dang mdza' med dpe bral ba/ /mnyam pa'i dpe med nam mkha' la med de/ /yon tan phra ba'i chos kyang mtshungs ma yin/ /rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs la byung/ /smen lam grub pa mi 'gag chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don grub lhun
312b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad mdza' yas pa/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang/ /dpag med mi gos gnas nyid legs rdzogs te/ /bde gnas gshegs kyang thugs rje'i spyod mi gos/ /'jig rten gsum la mchog gi grub stsol ba/ /'gag nyid mi 'gyur kye
312b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'o chos nyid bzang/ /mchog stsol sbyin mchog nyid gnas mchog nyid brnyed/ /'jig rten gsum mchog dam pa stsol mchog sgrub/ /bde gshegs dus gsum mkhyen sgrib mi mnga' ba/ /kun gyi dam tshig mchog gsum grub bdag stsol/ /de nas
312b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur tshig gi dam pa rjod/ /mgon po khyod la rab tu skyab mchi yis/ /dngos grub 'gro ba kun la phan byed pa/ /shin tu 'phags shing mchog gyur stsal du gsol/ /de nas sems can don byed chogs pa yi/ /sprul pa'i sprin ni phyogs bcur
312b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi ni/ /bsod nams dag gis kun 'ang sangs rgyas dang/ /kun tu bzang po la sogs rgyal sras rnams/ /bzhud de pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan bzhugs nas/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin don mdzad shog /bde gshegs bsngags pa'i phyir nang
312b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba rnams/ /phun sum tshogs kun mos pa ji bzhin du/ /bdag gi bsod nams rgyas pa'i stobs dag dang/ /dam chos rgyu yi stobs kyi/ gal 'byor shog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi mthu yis kyang/ /'gro don 'byor ba nyid ni phun tshogs
312b7(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /ji bzhin don gyi 'byor ba bsam mi khyab/ /'gro la rtag tu 'byung bar shog ces brjod/ /nama(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hye(rgyud 'grel): sarba thA khaM ung+ga te spa ra Na ni maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ 'dis kyang gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems
313a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyis 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir mi bslu ba yin no/ /zhes mngon par 'dod bar bya'o/ /mchod pa'i chog bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
313a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mchod bcas don la zhugs nas ni/ /da ni sems can ma lus phan sems kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems mchog phyag byas la/ /rnal 'byor bstan nas yid ni mnyam par bzhag /bsam gtan yan lag bzhi yi cho
313a3(rgyud 'grel): ga yis/ /ji ltar rang gi lha ni mnyes 'gyur ba/ /de ltar ci nus pas ni gsang sngags kyi/ /de nyid don gyi phan pa bskul bar bya/ /gsang sngags rjes su dran bya ba/ /de yi cho ga 'di rjod bya/ /mkhas pas sngar bshad cho ga yis/ /mdun du rang lha
313a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya/ /snying ga'i dbus su zla gzugs la/ /der ni yi ge rnams bsgoms te/ /ji srid sems ni dag gyur pa/ /de srid bzlas brjod brtsam par bya/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma ni/ /lung las bshad bzhin rdzogs byas te/ /sngags kyi
313a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub ci gsungs pa/ /rnam rtog las byung gsol ba gdab/ /de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ yan lag bzhi pa las ni gzhan pa yin no/ /mkhas pas mdun du rang gi lta/ /rnam par nges par blos bsams
313a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /de'i sngags rgyang ldan pa las/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bar ldan/ /de'i mdog rtags dang dbyibs rnams dang/ /nyer gdags bdag nyid dbyer med par/ /rang lha'i sbyor ldan bdag nyid can/ /bsod nams dman yang 'grub par 'gyur/
313a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes don dam pa'i tshul las gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /yi ge'i gnas de gyur pa ni/ /de las gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yang/ /rgyud las mtshan nyid gnyis su gsungs/ /sngar ni sangs rgyas sbyor cho ga /de bzhin
313b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems cho ga /ji ltar 'phags pa 'jam dbyangs sogs/ /yongs su gyur pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs/ /de sngags gnas ni gyur ba dang/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor bas so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA na'M/ a/ rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yang/ /rang gi snying
313b2(rgyud 'grel): gar 'di bkod la/ /byang chub sems ni rjes dran nas/ /de nyid bdag ces bsgom par bya/ /sku mdog rtags sogs grags pa yis/ /nye bar bdag pas dbyer med bya/ /de yi cho ga 'di shes bya/ /gur gum bzang po'i mdog
313b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra zhing/ /dbu la zur phud lnga dang ldan/ /phyag g.yon utpal rdor bcas bsnams/ /g.yas kyi phyag ni mchog sbyin mchog /stsol bar mdzad pa bsam par bya/ /de la 'di'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ he he he ku mA ra
313b4(rgyud 'grel): kA bi sU? ka ti pa tha s+tha smra par par ti thAM swAhA/ phyag rgya ni lag pa'i gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ phung mo gnyis kyi srin la gnyis dkris la/ mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i steng du bkug la bzhag nas snga ma bzhin du yan lag thams cad la 'di gtugs nas 'di'i 'og tu las
313b5(rgyud 'grel): brtsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi yang yi ge yongs su gyur pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa nyid las shes par bya'o/ /yang na rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i sngags rang phyag rgya rnams la
313b6(rgyud 'grel): yang sbyor ba 'di dang 'gal ba med pa yin no/ /yang na spyi'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'am/ so so'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su gyur pa'i tshul dang sbyar bar shes par bya ste spyi'i ni 'di yin par bshad do/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ka/ 'di la yang chos
313b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bya ba dang bral ba'o zhes ston par byed pa'i skra'i de kho na nyid nges par bsam par bya'o/ /rgyal sras kun kyi spyi yi ni/ /phyag rgya yid bzhin nor bur bshad/ yang na rgyud gsungs so so yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho gas bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i phyag
314a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni tshigs dang tshigs su sbyar ba yid bzhin gyi rin po che lta bu ste sbyar bar bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nI/ sarbA thA bi ma ti bi ka ra Na/ d+harma d+hU tu nir dzA tA saM swAhA/ /sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
314a2(rgyud 'grel): spyi'i 'o/ /spyi por thig ler bcas pa yi/ /kha ni kha dog kun ldan bsam/ /chos kun nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing/ /thob pa med pa nyid ces brjod/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nI kha/ spyi bo'i nang du dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po dkar zhing thig le dkar
314a3(rgyud 'grel): pos mdzos par byas pa'i snying po'i mchog sngas bzhin du bsams la/ /mig gnyis su yi ger dang ma thig les mtshan pa mar me ltar 'bar ba bsams la/ /cho ga bzhin du rang gi lta'i gnas la gnas te/ /sngar bzhugs su gsol
314a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhin du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar bu mngon du bya'o/ /de yi snying ga'i dbus chung ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri med pa/ /der ni yi ge'i gnas dgod de/ /a
314a5(rgyud 'grel): ni kha dog ser po'o/ /'di yi sgra yi de nyid ni/ /chos rnams gdod nas ma skyes brjod/ /yid la sogs pa kun 'bar ba/ /nang du chud par nges par bsam/ /sgra zhes bya ba phreng bar sbyar/ /me yi rtse mo'i 'od bcas pa/ /kun tu 'od byed rnam
314a6(rgyud 'grel): par dag /mi shes grong khyer 'jig byed pa'o/ /yi ge ka la sogs pa rnams kyang ji skad ston pa'i sgra'i de kho na nyid ji skad bshad pa brjod cing bkod la/ de nas mngon par 'dod pa'i sngags kyi phreng du bsams la/ srog dang rtsol ba
314a7(rgyud 'grel): legs par bsdams te/ yid slar sdud pa'i sbyor bas gnon par byas la/ /yid kyis sam shu bu cir Di pa dang ci 'dod pI dngos grub la dmigs pa'i sems kyis ji srid yid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /rnam pa
314b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang gsang sngags zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de/ yi ge de dang mthun pa'i sgra'i de kho na nyid bsams la bzlas brjod bya'o/ /'dir yang gang bsod nams kyi tshogs cam gyi dngos grub don du gnyer ba de rnams la yid kyi lam shub bur bya
314b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga'i phyir dus kyis nges pa med do/ /gang mthod pa'i chos nyid la dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma don du gnyer pa de rnams la ni/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su yid kyi bzlas pa nyid bya bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin no/ /yang ci nus pa ??
314b3(rgyud 'grel): ltos par ma'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ sngar gyi dus su bya ba dang mtshan ma can no/ /de la sngar gyi dus su bya ba ni bzlas pa'i grangs yongs su rdzogs pa'i nges pa'i dus te/ zhag dang zla ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi grangs dang dus nges
314b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mtshan ma can ni mchod rten dang/ /bas ris dang sku gzugs la sogs pa las 'od dang gsung 'byung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ston pa'i nges pa yongs su chad pa'o/ /de la snga ma ni yongs su ma dag pa'i sngags pa'i yan par shes par
314b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ste gang zhig gi dbang du mdzad nas/ shin tu bsngams te 'bum phrag gcig /yid kyis bzlas pa bya ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no/ /de'i gong du bsnyen pa gzhan bya ste/ de'i ni shub bu'i bsdas? brjod kyi skabs su yin
314b6(rgyud 'grel): par shes par bya'o/ /sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i mtshan ma can gyi sngon du bsnyen pa de la yang yid kyi bzlas pa nyid ni ji srid mtshan ma mthong gi bar du bya la/ de'i gong du zla ba gnyis ni shub bu'i bzlas? brjod bya ba yin par snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes
314b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya 'di las gzhan /zlos pa po la phan 'dod pas/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya/ /mgon po rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /gsang sngags gang zhig zlos 'dod pa/ /de yi phyag rgya sngags
315a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa/ /mkhas pas yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /de la yi ge ni 'di yin te/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ A/ 'di'i sgra'i de kho nyid ni sngar bshad pa yin no/ /phyag rgya ni yang mdzod spu la sogs pa ste/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khu
315a2(rgyud 'grel): tshur bcangs la smin ma'i mtshams su bzhag par bya'o/ /sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ A haM dza/ sngon bzhin lha yi de nyid ni/ /yongs su gyur pa'i sbyor ba las/ /dbyer med pa yi cho ga yi/ /rang gi bdag nyid nye bar sbyar/ /rang lha'i
315a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor la gnas shing/ /yi ge lnga yi sbyor ba can/ /lus kyi mgo dang lte ba dang/ /de bzhin lte ba'i gong dag dang/ /smin ma'i mtshams dang mgo phyogs su/ /mnyam par bzhag pas dgod par bya/ /cho ga de 'di byin brlabs che/ /thub
315a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog gis bka' stsal to/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a(rgyud 'grel): ser po'o/ /lus kyi 'og tu a ni dbang chen yin te rnal 'byor gyi gnas yin par bshad do/ /de nas lte bar ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ baM/ dkar po ste 'di ni khug rna'i tshogs
315a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbus na gnas pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad do/ /lte ba'i steng na yi ge ra ste/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ raM/ me'i dkyil 'khor te kha dog dmar bar snang ngo/ /smin ma'i 'tshams su yi ge ha ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te kha dog nag
315a6(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ haM/ spyi bo'i dbus su yi ge kha dog thams cad dang ldan par bsam par bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ khaM/ yi ge lnga ni rnam dag dgod/ /mi ni 'od ldan skye 'gyur te/ /blo ldan ye shes nyi ma 'dra/ /sdig pa thams cad
315a7(rgyud 'grel): nges par btul/ /rdo rje mo 'bar lta bu ni/ /gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ /bdud kyi tshogs ni mi bzad dang/ bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis mthong/ /thod pa sbyor ba'i dbus na ni/ /yi ge a ni thig ler ldan/ /yi ger
315b1(rgyud 'grel): ni mig nyid du/ /mar me 'bar ba lta bu yin/ /snga ma'i gnas kyi sbyor ba dang/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'ang snga ma bzhin/ /blo yis rang lus sngon bzhin du/ /de bzhin gshegs dang bral bar bsam/ /sgra zhes bya ba'i phreng bar sbyar/ /yi ge dang ni yi ger
315b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /dril bu'i sgra ltar ma chad par/ /yid la song bar bsam par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags gang mngon par 'dod pas snga ma bzhin du bkod de bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' i gsang sngags zlos par byed pa rnams
315b3(rgyud 'grel): la rnam pa gnyis pa 'di ni shin tu myur du grub pa'i thabs yin par shes par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la ni yi ge 'di dgod par shes par bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ b+haM/ 'di'i sgra'i de kho na nyid ni sngar bshad pa nyid do/ /phyag rgya ni lhung bzed
315b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): saman+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ sarba kle sha ni slu nga na/ sarba d+ha rma ba shi ta prA bta ga ga na sa ma ya swAhA/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags dang phyag rgya gzhan dag kyang/ rgyud las ji ltar grags pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /snga ma
315b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rang gi lha'i yi ge yongs su gyur pa'i sbyor ba byas la/ de'i yi ge dgod pa las ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ thugs rje 'byung ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
315b6(rgyud 'grel): chen por dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon nyid la 'os pa yin gyi/ rig pa'i dbang bskur ba ni ma yin no/ /yan lag bzhi'i bsams gtan la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gang rgyud gzhan las bshad pa'i cho ga mtshang ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang 'gal bar
315b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /lha rnams kyang shin tu tshim zhing thugs mnyes par 'gyur ba yin no/ /ji ltar byas pa'i bzlas brjod dang bsrung ba dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba ni shin du myur du grub pa'i phyir sgrub pa pos rgyud gzhan dag las bshad pa de yang bya'o/ /de las
316a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang shin tu myur du grub par 'dod par bya ste/ nge bas na 'di dang cho ga gzhan bsgre bar bya'o/ /rang gi lha'i gnas kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba las rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas kyi bya ba la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /gang gi kha dog gar
316a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /de yi dkyil 'khor de 'gyur ste?/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dngos grub rnam gsum dbye shes nas/ /rtag tu zhi la sogs pa'i pas gsum gyi/ /kha dog dkyil 'khro dag ni so sa yi/ /
316a3(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba rnam bzhi cho ga bzhin du bya/ /dkar po ser po de bzhi ne dmar dang gzhan/ /zhi la sogs pa'i dbye bar rtag tu bshad/ /zlum po dang ni grub bzhir bcas pa dang/ /grub gsum de bzhin pad+ma'i dbyibs can yin/ /zhi pa'i sbyor bas kha ni byang du blta
316a4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu zhi zhing pad+ma'i 'dug thabs bya/ /shar du kha bltas bkra shis thabs kyis 'dug /dga' bcas sems kyis rgyas par bya ba yin/ /nub tu kha ltas bzang ba'i thabs kyis 'dug /khro bo dga' bcas sems ngar dbang du bya/ /lho phyogs kha
316a5(rgyud 'grel): ltas stan ni med pa 'am/ /gcig bus khros pa'i yid kyi mngon spyod bya/ /rang lha'i kha dog la sogs cho ga'i rim/ /dkar po la sogs zhi la rtag tu sbyar/ /dris sogs las dang rjes mthun cho ga bzhin/ /kha dog la sogs dbye ba'i ji bzhin
316a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /zhi dang stobs bskyed lus ni brtan pa dang/ /bskrad dang dgod dang bsad par bya la ba'ang/ /sngags kyang oM dang phyag 'tshal sbyor bar ldan/ /hUM dang phaT dag mngon sbyong bya ba la/ /oM dang swAhA zhes pas zhi ba bya/ /thag ma oM dang
316a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rgyas pa la/ /hUM dang phaT gnyis dag gi sbyor ba las/ /bar du ming bcug bskul ba bya ba yin/ /de ltar gsang sngags kyi dbye bas zhib dang/ rgyas pa dang/ mngon sbyor la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye bas gsungs pa yin par
316b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bstan pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //de ltar ci rigs pa dang ci 'dod pas bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'i rjes su spyad pa sgrub pa nyid las snga ma bzhin du bdag las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byas nas/ bcom
316b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das yon tan mdza' yas pa mnga' ba dang/ sems can ma lus pa bskyab pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam la ci 'byor ba'i mchong pa bya'o/ /de nas thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin du 'am/ de nas gzhan pa'i
316b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i yon tan yongs su grogs pa las 'byung ba'i bstong pas bstong cing mchod pas de rnams kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrags par bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /de'i sbyor ba yang 'di yin te/
316b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba mkhyen cing thugs chung pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi bsod nams ma lus pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi zhing/ /
316b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang/ gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa bla na med pa'i gnas chen po la rab tu bzhag par bya'o/ /ji srid 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la yang dag par 'grub par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du/ tshe rabs de
316b6(rgyud 'grel): dang de dag tu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs las gzhan mi byed bar rgyun du bde ba dang ying dge ba'i rjes su 'gro bas de dag gis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de bsgrub pa dang rjes su mthun
316b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid kyis dngos po dang phyi nang gi 'byor pa rnams kyang kha na ma thob med cing yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyad pa dang/ mngon par 'dod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par rnam par 'phel bar
317a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /de lta bu'i smon lam bder bsdus pa yin te/ rgya cher ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i smon lam 'am/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las gsungs pa'i smon lam gzhan dag la nyid dang
317a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan du bzla bar bya'o/ /yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bdag kyang smon lam 'debs par bya'o zhes smon par bya'o/ /de nas arga blangs la phyi bor thal mo sbyar ba bzhag ste/
317a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub dang dpa' rnams la yang dag pa'i yon tan las byung ba'i phyag 'tshal bar bya ste/ nyes pa thams cad bral ba gang/ /yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan cing/ /gcig tu 'gro ba'i mdzad pa/ /sras bcas mgon la phyag
317a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ /mgon dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /thugs rje can gyis bdag byin brlabs/ /theg pa chen las mi nyams shing/ /khyad par du yang 'gro ba dang/ /slar yang bdag la phan mdzad
317a5(rgyud 'grel): par/ /rjes su gzung bar dgongs nas ni/ /mgon rig dang sngags par/ ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol/ /yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya spyi bor bcings la/ gyen du bstod pa dang bcas dgrol bar bya'o/ /de ltar na sngar bshad pa'i
317a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi dbang gis bzhugs pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa'i bsrung ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyang yang kyis dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid de'i ngo bo nyid yin
317a7(rgyud 'grel): par byin gyis brlabs la/ byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i phan pa'i blos/ /rje rje sems dpa' i ngo bo nyid du de'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /yang na bzlas brjod kyi mthar phyag rgya gsum dang byin gyis brlab pa nyid kyi
317b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod nye bar bsdu ba'i chog 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas de 'ba' zhig bya'o/ /spyi bor yang snga ma bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge rnam par dgod pa dang rdo rje bgo bar bya'o/ /de ltar sbyor ba byas pas rdo rje sems dpa' 
317b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid las gang du yang nyams pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag ni gang zhig 'di mthong ba nang reg pa dang de dang lhan cig smra ba de thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par
317b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de nas dge ba'i rgya ba khyad par can gyi bya ba 'dod pa'i sems kyis langs la shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su me tog gi tshal ba bkam par bdag
317b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug bau ting ngo'i yi ge'i de'i? phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa 'am/ snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis brlab pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa zab cing rgya chen po la 'jug par byed pa'i mdo sde rnams chos kyi sbyin pa
317b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la dga' ba'i bsam pa sa nyan pa po rnams spyan drangs klag par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzugs can ni 'jig rten dbang phyag yin no zhes don dam pa'i tshul dag la gsungs pa dang/ gang phyir bcom ldan 'das de
317b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa yang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin pas de gnyis gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i dus su bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yi ge yin te/ na ma:
317b7(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta budb+hA nA/ sa/ 'di'i sgre'i nge kho na nyid ni chos thams cad 'du ba dang dmigs su med pa'o zhes mngon par sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /'di'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ dril bu lta bur byas nas brkyang la mthe pong/
318a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /'di'i sngags ni/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): saman+ta bud+d+hA nA/ sarba ta thA ga ta A ba yo ti ta kA ru Na ma ya ra ra ra tUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ ji skad bshad pa'i yi ge dang phyag rgya 'di dang sbyar
318a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /spyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'i snying po dgod par byas la/ dam pa'i chos kyang ci nas par glags nas gzhan yang mchod rten gyi las dang dkyil 'khor gyi las la sogs pa byas zin pa dang/ de nas langs la bya ba cung zad gang ci
318a3(rgyud 'grel): yang rung ba rdzogs par byas nas/ slong bas bslang ste thob pa 'am sbyin bdag gaM dge 'dun las ji lta ba bzhin rnyed pa'i kha zas nya dang sha dang sgog pa dang/ ri sgog dang/ sgog btsong dang/ la phug dang/ lha la sogs pa la phul ba'i zas dang/ de bzhin
318a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa la phul ba'i lta bshos dang/ gang gzhan dag kyang lhag mar gyur pa dang/ rnying pa dang/ kha dri mi zhim pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba chang la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba'i bya ba spangs la rang gi lta la zas kyi phud ci rigs sar sngon
318a5(rgyud 'grel): du phul la 'byor ba ci yod pa las blo bur du ltags pa rnams la ci rig spar 'go bshad bya ste/ shing rta'i mig bsku ba dang 'dra bar phan tshun rgyu rkyen las byung ba'i rang gi lus gnas par bya ba'i phyir dga' ba'i sems dang chos kyi dbyings
318a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi li ges yang dag par sbyangs la/ bdag nyid las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs nas zas la spyad par bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM baM swAhA/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'o/ /stobs sbyin pa'i rig pa lan brgyad mngon par
318a7(rgyud 'grel): bzla bar bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ po d+he swahwA na/ oM pa lin+ta te dzo mA li ni swAhA/ de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i pa'i lta'i sbyor bas gnas la/ zas kyi bya ba rdzogs pa dang/ lhag ma'i chang than dang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma rnams de
318b1(rgyud 'grel): don du gnyer ba rnams la byin la ldang bar bya'o/ /kha zas kyi lhag ma'i chang zan la yang las thams cad ba'i snying po'i don yod pa'i gtum bos mngon par bsngags pa'i 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la dbul bar bya ste/ de ltar byas pas yongs su mnyes shing
318b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA NA/ tra ta a mo g+ha tsaN+DA ma hA ro Sha Na sphoT ya hUM tra ma ya tra to haM maM/ de nas zas la spyad zin pa dang/ cung zad ngal bso ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ba la sogs pa dang/ /sdig pa bshags
318b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa sems rnam par dag par byed pa'i rgyu rnams kyang de bzhin du legs par byas nas/ zab cing rgya che ba'i chos kyi kun dga' ra bar gnas par bya'o/ /de nas phyi dro'i dus su snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod byas la/ mtshan stod smad la ni
318b4(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po sems pa la sogs dang mngon par ldan pa nyid du bya'o/ /de'i bar gyi dus la ni las kyi rdo rje rdo rje chen po'i go bgos par gyur par byas la/ khri med pa'i mal du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag
318b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad btud bas phyag byas la/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen por smon pa mngon sum du byas te/ rang gi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i 'os su bya ba'i phyir
318b6(rgyud 'grel): khams mnyam pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes yid la byas la nyal bar bya'i/ gnyid kyi bde ba la chags par bya ba'i phyir ma yin te/ de lta bus dang por glo g.yas pa phab nas nyal bar bya ste phyis ni cib dbang bye'o/ /nyal nas kyang myur du sad par bya
318b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir snang ba'i 'du shes yid la bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'i yid du bya'o/ /de phyi de nyid gsang sngags kyi sgo'i byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas spyod pa de nyid kyi cho ga'i rgyun mi 'chad pas gsang sngags mnyes par bya ba dang rab
319a1(rgyud 'grel): tu ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma la sogs pa ji ltar sngon du spyad pa'i khyad par rnams la cho ga ji bzhin gsungs pa bzhin ma lus par rdzogs par bya bar bdag gis mi nus so zhes
319a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin zhan cing 'khum par mi bya'i/ stobs ci yod pas mngon par brtson par bya ste/ cho ga bla med pa 'di ni don yod pa yin pas sems can la phan pa'i sems dang ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ci nas
319a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang mnyes par byas nas shin tu phul du byung ba'i bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba nyid yin par khong du chul par dbya'o/ /gnyis po 'di ni yongs su spang par mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag por lta zhing nye bar zhi
319a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems dang/ 'gro ba ma lus pa yongs su bskyar bar bya ba'i phyir yang des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu son pa nyid du rgyun du ldan pas nges par rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur bar shes par
319a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /cho ga 'di la ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi gtsang sbra gtso bor gyur ba yin pas phyi'i gtsang sbru la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /bza' ba ma yin pa zos pa dang/ phyag dang dang lhag ma dang 'dres pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa yang mi bya'o/ /
319a6(rgyud 'grel): las bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi khrus dang gtsang sgra la sogs pa'i rim pa ci rigs par rjes su spyad par bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho ga chu bo stsogs par byed/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi go rims ldan par bya/ /dang por dam tshig ces
319a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyag rgya dang/ /phyag rgya gsum po sngags bcas gang yin cing/ /ra yi sbyor bas chu yi gnas sbyang zhing/ /mi g.yo mngon dang 'jig rten gsum 'dul pa'i/ /de'i sngags phyag rgyas phyogs sogs bcing ba ni/ /de nyid rang bzhin bsgom
319b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags pas bya/ /lan gsum bzlas pa'i sa dang khrus byas pa/ /rtag tu rjes 'jug sems ni yid la bya/ /yang na mi g.yo'i sngags rgyal rjes dran la/ /mkhas pas mi smra bar ni khrus byas te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): samn+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ raM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'o/ /phyag
319b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni ral gri nyid do/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ haM/ 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon gyi ste phyag rgya ni sngar bshad pa nyid do/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzrA NAM/ haM/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i'o/ /'di'i sgra'i de kho na nyid ni bshad ma thag bnyid shes par bya'o/ /'di'i phyag
319b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/ /'di'i sngags ni/ na ma sa man+ta badzrA tAM/ ha ha ha/ bisma ye sarba ta thA ga ta bi Sha ya sam+b+ha ba trai lo kya bi dza ya swAhA/ /khrus byas nye reg byas nas slar yang dam tshig stsogs/ /rgya bcings sngags kyi sbyor bas mgo la
319b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs par bzhag /sangs rgyas sras dang dge 'dun la lus mthar thug pa/ /bsam la chu'i sbyor ba gsum ni dbul bar bya/ /'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa mchog gzhol sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sras rnams rnam dag yid kyis phyag byas la/ /
319b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags la sogs rtog dang bral ba'i yid kyis ni/ /dul bar ldan pas gnas de nyid du 'gro bar bya/ /gnas te nyid du brjod pa ji bzhin rab bya zhing/ /sngar bshad cho ga de yis sems ni 'dul bar bya/ lkog ma brang dang lte ba rked pa tsam bsten
319b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i gnas ni thob par 'gyur/ /gang tshe de lta'i tshigs rab tu zhugs gyur pa/ /sdig pa'i tshogs kun rnam par 'jig par byas nas ni/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid gnas theb cho gas ni legs bsags phyir/ /bgogs rnams des
319b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom sngags kyi dngos grub myur du thob/ /de nas 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa rgyud gzhan las bstan pa yang dag par blangs la/ sgrub pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gzung nas de brtsam par bya'o/ /'jig rten pa nyid ni 'dir mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i cho ga
320a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gang mtshan ma dang bcas pa de ni 'jig rten pa'o/ /zhes rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ 'di ni 'dir gtso che mtshan ma can gyi chos la lhag par mos pa'i 'gro ba la bltos nas gsungs pa yin no/ /gang yang
320a2(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin 'dir gtogs pa'i mos pa'i khyad par de rnams la ni/ de la lhag par mos pa'i yid la byed pa bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang/ sgrub pa'i cho ga ni dngos grub kyi le'u dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
320a3(rgyud 'grel): le'u las ci rigs par gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de las kyang de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pa'i yid la byed pas kyang/ bzlas brjod kyi bya ba'i yan lag mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa yin par
320a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod de/ de'i nye bar gdags pas de rtogs par byed pa'i thibs yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par byang chub pa dang 'brel ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga /slob dpon dpal bzang rabs dags mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //
320a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po padmA ka ra barba dang/ zhu chen gyi tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub thabs bdugs// */ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
320a6(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho gas dam tshig ma nos pa'i sngags pas de las 'byung ba'i sngags rjes su dran par bya ba'i cho ga'i rim pa mngon bshad pa'i phyir 'di brtsams te de'i rim pa ni 'di'o/ /des dang por dam tshig ji ltar mnos
320a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bsrung ba la 'bad par bya ste de la dam tshig ni 'di'o/ /snags rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang de dag gi phyag rgya dang sngags rnams dang theg pa chen po mchog gi chos dang nge ston pa'i bla ma rnams la smad par mi bya'o/ /sangs
320b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la sogs pa 'di rnams nams kyang mi btang ngo/ /de dag las rtag par sems rab tu dang bas yon tan du gzung ba dang/ gus pa dang mchod pa dang mnyem par byas la ci nus su yang 'bad par bya'o/ /'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
320b2(rgyud 'grel): cad dang de dag gi chos dang mkhan bo dang slob dpon dang bla ma gzhan rnams dang bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i chos spyad pa thang ma dang gsar bu gzhan rnams la yang smad par mi bya'o/ /de dag la yang dus ji lta ba dang/ ji ltar rigs par rim gror
320b3(rgyud 'grel): yang bya'o/ /lha dang bla ma la byis pa'i chos nyid dang khong khro ba mi bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi lta la sogs pa la yang smod par mi bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems rin po che phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa srog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /
320b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la yang byams pa dang snying rje bskyed nas de dag gi gnod pa bzlog par 'bad par bya'o/ /de dag gis gnod pa byas pa la yang bzod par bya'o/ /zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang/ chos sbyin pas ji ltar rigs par sems
320b5(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la rtag par ci nus su phan gdags par bya ste de bas na 'jungs pa ni rgyang ring du spang bar bya'o/ /dam tshig med pa la phyag rgya dang sngags mi bstan dam tshig can la yang lung med par mi bstan te/ /ma rung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba
320b6(rgyud 'grel): chang mi btung ba nan tan cher bya'o/ /mngon na gang bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa de ni mi bya'i bdag dang gzhan la phan pa 'ba' shig tu 'bar bar bya'o/ /khri la nyal bar mi bya ste de ni dam tshig go /de nas bar chad med cing ring bo mi thogs par che 'di
320b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid la sgrib pa zad par bya ba dang/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bla ma las sngags gang yang rung ba zhig ji lta ba bzhin du mnos te/ sngags ji ltar mnos pa bslabs pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par
321a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa gong du smos pa sbyod cing/ gnas dben pa 'du 'dzi med pa 'tshe ba med pa 'phrod ba'i ri phug gam sul lam nags la sogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa sangs
321a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams bzhugs bzhugs pa 'am gtsug lag khang dang khang pa la sogs pa ji skad smos pa dang ldan par tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pa'i
321a3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis 'du 'dzi med par chos kyi dga' ba'i longs spyod la dang pa bskyed de blo dang sgro ba dang sems dpa' ba phun sum tshogs pa mchog dang ldan par byas la gnod pa thams cad la ji mi snyam zhing dge bar 'tsho
321a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ldan pas dga' bar gnas par bya'o/ /der gnas nas blo brtan bas nang par langs nas dgra'i 'khor ma lus bar spang la snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa bsgral ba rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pas khrus byas kyang rung ma byas kyang?
321a5(rgyud 'grel): rung nges? be med/ dge bar spyad pa mtshan nyid ji skad bsgrags pa'i nang gi khrus byed pas sa gzhi gtsang ma'i dkyil 'khor me tog gis gtog bar sku gzugs sam mchod rten nam dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gang yang rung bzhig mdun du bzhag gcan?
321a6(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs la sogs pa med kyang rung ste shar phyogs sam byang phyogs su bltas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rab tu dang ba bskyed de de dag ji ltar rigs par phyogs bcur mngon sum bzhin du dmigs la phyogs?
321a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa'i cho gas bdag yongs su sbyang ba 'di ltar bya ste/ de dag gi rim pa ni 'di'i'o/ /dang por sngags bas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ rim gro bskyed la gus par phyag 'di ltar bya'o/ /phyogs bcu mdza' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
321b1(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos su bcas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun du bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
321b2(rgyud 'grel): btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas btud de bsam pa thag pa nas 'di skad ces brjod do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba skye ba thog man mchis ba nas 'khor na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig pa mi dge
321b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i las gang bdag gis bgyis pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang rjes su yi rang ba dad de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la saur? bshags so zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
321b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pI zhi ba'i
321b5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku so so rang gis rig pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gi ngo bo dbul te/ sangs
321b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gi ngo bo dus thams
321b7(rgyud 'grel): cad du yong? ye 'bul gyis thugs rje chen po rnams kyis bdag bzhes shig ces lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas sems can sdug bsngal thams cad la snying rje chen po mngon du bya ste byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa ni/ /sangs rgyas
322a1(rgyud 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
322a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs kyi bar du ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas
322a3(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub du sems bskyed do zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /
322a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ 'phags pa rang
322a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos rnams dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas gsol ba gdab pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos chos
322a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi char dbab pa dang thabs dang tshul sna tshogs kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad cing rtag tu bzhugs bar? gsol lo zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas sems can la phan pa bstabs pa ni sems can thams cad ngan pa'i mdza' dbugs ma phyin
322a7(rgyud 'grel): pa so so'i skye bo'i gnas myur du spangs te bde ba mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob par gyur cig dam pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyang de'i gong nas gong du 'ar ba'i khyad par thob nas bla na med pa'i byang chub
322b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bde ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas sems can thams cad la bdag gi bsod nams bsngo ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi bsngo ba ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bdag gi bsod
322b2(rgyud 'grel): nams ma lus pa yang sems can thams cad yang dag pa'i bde ba ma thob pa rnams bla na med pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa 'di rnams ce? nus pa las gzhan du yang rung ngo/
322b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bsam pa yongs su spyangs ba des theg pa chen po las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir skyil mo krung bcas te dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya la sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /de la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya
322b4(rgyud 'grel): ni thal mo sbyar te mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ngo/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyi yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas/ /de'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /na ma ssa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a sa me tri sa me sa ma ya
322b5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya bdag rnam par dag par bya ba ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug ste mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ngo/ /de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya ste sngags mi 'di'o/ /na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM d+harma nhatu
322b6(rgyud 'grel): swab+hA bAt+ma kohaM/ de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rgyab sprod du bsnol? la mthe bo gnyis kyang sprad do/ /rgya mchog dpal dang ldan pa ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba yin/ /'jig rten
322b7(rgyud 'grel): mgon po skyod pa yi/ /'khor lo rab tu 'di sgyur ro/ /de'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /na massa man+ta badzrA NAM badzra t+ma? kohaM/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /yi ge ri dkar po yang spyi bor bsam mo/ /de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas gnas lngar gtugs na go
323a1(rgyud 'grel): bgos par 'gyur ro/ /thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar mthe bo gnyis gung mo la gzhar ro/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya ste de'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /na massa man+ta badzra NAM badzra ka ba tsa hUM/ /de nas bgegs
323a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam par sel pa mi zad par rig sngags chen mo rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug gung mo gnyis rtse sbrad srin lag gnyis brkyang mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad bkug pa 'di ni
323a3(rgyud 'grel): srung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya ste de'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /na massarba ta thA ga te b+hya ssarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hyassarba thA haM khaM ?? ma hA ba la sarba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya ni dzA te hUM hUM h+ra Ta tra Ta a pra ti ha te swAhA/ bgegs dang dan khrid thams cad dang/
323a4(rgyud 'grel): srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rnams/ /'di ni dran pa tsam gyis su/ /de dag thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur/ /de nas sems mnyam par bzhag ste mdun du rgya mtsho chen po bsams la de'i dbus nas ri rab gru bzhi lham pa byung ba'i steng
323a5(rgyud 'grel): na rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa rtseg pa'i nang na pad+ma'i seng ge'i gdan chen po pad+ma'i gang na chung du mang pos bskor bar bsam mo/ /de la rgya mtsho chen po la sogs ji ltar bsams pa'i rim pa bzhin du 'gyur bar sngags 'dis byin gyis
323a6(rgyud 'grel): brlab bo/ /ni massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM aM A na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hyassarba thA ud+ga te spa ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ de ltar na de dag thams cad de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yang na nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig sngags kyis kyang de bzhin
323a7(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i seng+ge'i? gdan de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi kha dog thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan dang cod pan can dang la'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can nam/ shAkya thub pa cha byang dang kha dog dang
323b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs ji skad du grags pa'ang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa 'od 'phro ba mang pos mdza' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gsal bar snang ba sems can gyi khams re ba ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar mdzad pa sril? mo
323b2(rgyud 'grel): krung bcas te ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas logs kyi pad+ma la spyan ras gzigs dbang po g.yon logs kyi pad+ma la rdo rje 'dzin bzhugs par bsam mo/ /bdag gi lha yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun
323b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas logs kyi pad+ma la bzhugs par bsam/ kho ra khor yug gi pad+ma gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyir mi ldog pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa la thogs pa med pa'i mthu brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
323b4(rgyud 'grel): cad la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa rnams bzhugs par bsam mo/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu dang/ bdag gi lha dang rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhugs par bsam mo/ /bdag gi lta rdo rje 'dzin yin na g.yas su bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras
323b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang po g.yon du bzhag go /yang na lha rnams dgong pa'i rim pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin duAng rung ngo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi yi ge bkod pas bzhag pa ni/ na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM a/ bcom ldan 'das
323b6(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pa'i yi ge ni b+ha ste/ na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM b+ha/ de bzhin du spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i ni/ na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM sa/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi ni na massa man+ta badzrA NAM ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni/ na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM ka/ bdag gi lha yang de'i
323b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gang yin pas gzhag go/ yang na byang chub sems dpa' i yi ges gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni/ na massa man+ta badzrA NAM pa/ de'i
324a1(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya gong du smos pa bsngan te/ de'i sngags lan gsum bzlas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig gzigs
324a2(rgyud 'grel): pas mnyes te gzhan la phan 'dogs par bzheng pas sngags pa ji srid dung dod pa de srid du byin gyis brlab bo/ de nas 'bags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags lan gsum brjod pas bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid de bzhin
324a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug par bsams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi phyi rol tu 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags kyis mtshams bcad par bya ste de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang
324a4(rgyud 'grel): gung mo gnyis brkyang srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtser mthe bos mnan/ lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i mthil du gzhug go /mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya ral gri shubs su bcug pa ste
324a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ na massa man+ta badzrA tAM a tsal kA Na tsanDa? ma hA ro Sha Na spho Ta ya hUM trag haM maM/ lan gsum du'o/ /ral gri shubs nas phyung la bskrad pa ni g.yon nas skor/ mtshams bcad pa ni g.yas nas bskor ro/ /de bzhin du 'das las gzhan
324a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan dag kyang ji ltar rig par bya'o/ /sku gzugs sam mchod rten yod na dang po nyid du chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i chus bkrus la de nas gdod la 'di dag kun bya'o/ /de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te
324a7(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo btud la yon chab dang por gsol nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do/ /yon chab la sogs pa de dag kyang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i chu 'am chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge bzhag pa'i chus gtor te sbyangs la mchod
324b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya dang so so'i sngags kyis lan gsum du btab ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod cing dbul lo/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin la
324b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa la sogs pa de dag gis mtshan nas smos la ji skad du bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la mchod pa bya'o/ /yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas thams
