324b3(rgyud 'grel): cad la khyab pa'i yid kyis chod pa'i yo byang rnams re re nas dbul lo/ de la mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ni thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba'o/ /yon chab dang spos la sogs pa'i sngags ni 'di rnams so/ /na massa man+ta bud+d+hA ?? ga ga na sa? ma sA
324b4(rgyud 'grel): ma swAhA/ yon chab kyi sngags so/ /na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM bi shud+d+hi gand+hod+d+ha ba swAhA/ spos kyi sngags so/ na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ ma hA mai dryadpu ta ga te swAhA/ me tog gi sngags so/ /na massa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM d+harma d+hA d+hA? nu ga te swAhA/ bdug pa'i sngags so/ /na massa man+ta bud+d+hA ?? ??
324b5(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta artsa spha ra Na b+hA bsag? gan? dArya swAhA/ /mang me'i sngags so/ /rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba'i yon chab la sogs pa'i sngags kyi btab cing mchod na'ang nyes pa med do/ /'dar spos la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa zhi smos pa ?? bcom ldan
324b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das la mchod pa'i yo byed mchan ma cim bstan par zad kyi de kho nar des pa ni med do/ /nge bsan 'jig rten bsngags pa'i mchod pa'i yo byang rnams 'byor na 'phags pa mi g.yo ba 'am/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ges bsangs la dbul lo/ /mchod
324b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yo byad rnams la 'byor na yang sems rab tu dang bas mchod pa bya ba'i bsam pa bskyed la mchod pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags rnams brjod na thams cad rdzogs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcun mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang yid
325a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbul bar bya ste de'i thabs kyang 'di'o/ /phyogs bcu na sa dang chu las skyes pa'i rin po che dang me tog la sogs pa mdzes pa'i dngos po de rnams kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbul lo
325a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes thal mo sbyar la/ sems thag pa nas phul na mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang spyi bor mchod pa'i phyag rgya byas la phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dus thams cad
325a3(rgyud 'grel): du rnyed slab yongs su dag pa/ rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa'i sbrin chen po 'di ltar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang/ chos kyi dbyibs kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang/ bdag gi bsod
325a4(rgyud 'grel): nams dang ye shes dang smon lam gyi mthus/ dam pa rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings khyab pa mchod pa'i sbrin chen po dang bstod pa dang rgyan dam pa sna tshogs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi
325a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du byung zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis kyang brlabs par gyur cig ces brjod dam bsams la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i rig sngags chen po 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /
325a6(rgyud 'grel): na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a sba ra hi maM ga gan khaM/ d+harma d+hA twa k+Sha ra sa ma tA yA sarba ta thA ga ta/ parShaT maN+Da la ma ma pra Ni d+hi pu n+ya dz+nyA na be leM/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha ne na ce swAhA/ /de ltar mchod pa chen po'i sprin de bzhin gshegs
325a7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur bar/ yang ches par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /myur du 'grub par byed pa rdo rje 'dzin gyi glu bstod pa dam pa 'dis kyang dus gsum
325b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnams la bstod par bya'o/ /mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog chos can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /yon tan mdza' yas dngos grub thams? cad stsol/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam chos can/ /
325b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan phra mo'i cha la'ang mdza' med de/ /nam mkha' dang yang mnyam ba'i dper mi rung/ /rtag tu sems can rnams la grub mchog stsol/ /dpe dang bral ba'i dngos grub mdza' yas rnams/ /rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las
325b3(rgyud 'grel): phyung/ /smon lam grub pa mi 'gag chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub brtson 'grus mdza' yas pa/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa snang/ /mdza' yas dpag med go 'phang rab brnyes kyang/ /khams gsum kun tu dngos
325b4(rgyud 'grel): grub mchog stsol la/ /thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo rgyun mi gcod/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid can/ /mgon po dus gsum gshegs shing sgrib med pa/ /rtag tu khams gsum kun la mchog sbyin grub/ /mchog sbyin
325b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi gnas ni rab brnyes pa/ /dam tshig mchog gsum grub pa bdag la stsol/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la skyabs su mchis kyis bdag la thugs rjes gzigs te/ 'gro ba ma
325b6(rgyud 'grel): lus pa yongs su bskyab pa'i mthu bdag la stsol cig ces kyang brjod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams klas pa ma lus par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bya ste de'i cho ga ni 'di'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i phyogs bcu
325b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du dam pa rgya chen po sems can gyi don mdzad pa kha ton dang tshul dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs su ldan pa kun tu bzang po sprul pa mang po rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig /des kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyi nang gi mi bde pa
326a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu zhi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ma lus pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces
326a2(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas/ byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang/ bdag gi smon lam gyi mthus sems can rnams
326a3(rgyud 'grel): la phan pa'i phyir/ sngar bsams pa'i don de dag thams cad sems can gyi khams 'dir ji ltar rigs par myur du 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod de/ de nas sems can gyi don gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig sngags nam mkha' i mdzod
326a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar mdzod pa 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba thA kham ung+ga te spha ra Na hi ma ga ga na khaM swAhA/ 'di lan gsum bzlas pas ji ltar bsam pa'i don rnams sems can gyi khams 'dir
326a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du 'gyur bar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen gyi/ gzhan shes pa chung du rnams kyis ni mi shes so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa pa
326a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis yid ches par bya'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byas shing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas pa des bdag gi lha'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi yi ge dgod pa la sogs pas bdag nyid lha'i skur bsgyur la yi
326a7(rgyud 'grel): ge khaM dkar po yang spyi bor bzhag ste/ mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems la der yi ge sbyar ba byas te dbugs dang dran pa rab tu bsdams nas slar sdud pa'i tshig gis non par yid la 'am/ bzhub? sa ste/ mi
326b1(rgyud 'grel): drag mi ngal bar mi skyob 'am ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /slob dpon dbang bskur bas ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am byang chub sems dpa' i sngags zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
326b2(rgyud 'grel): bshag nas bzlas pa bya'o/ /ji skad du bshad pa ltar ma chus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs pa'i sems sam/ sems can gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la rjes su yi rang bar
326b3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs shing bzlas pa'o/ /de nas dal lam gtong 'dod na bzlas pa btang ste/ yang las kyi rdo rjer bdag bsgyur la snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstong cing mchod pa byas la/ dge ba
326b4(rgyud 'grel): ci byas pa yongs su bsngos la bdag kyang dge ba'i las 'dis sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol nus par gyur cig /bdag nam sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang skyes so chog tu byang
326b5(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bdag gi ngo bo dang/ 'khor dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs par shog cig ces brjod do/ /de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
326b6(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba rnams bdag theg pa chen po las mi mnyam shing khyad par thob par byin gyis rlob shig ces gsol ba bya'o/ /de nas yon chab phul te/ gdon mi za bar bdag la yang/ /rjes su gzung bar dgongs nas su/ /
326b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol/ /de nas spyi bor dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya byas te gyen du bkrol nas sngad dam tshig gi phyir zhugs pa rnams gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams
327a1(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa'ang yid kyis bgrol lo/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis bdag rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs
327a2(rgyud 'grel): bod/ spyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'ang bsam mo/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas go cha yang bgos la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la byas nas dge ba'i las dam pa bya bar bsam zhing ldang ngo/ /langs
327a3(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod la ston pa'i mdo snga zab cing rgya che bag lha la sogs pa gnyer te chos sbyin pa'i sems kyis bklag go /de nas lus gso ba'i phyir zas bza' ba'i rim pa'ang 'di'o/ /dang por ci 'byor
327a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zas la sngags lan gsum mam bdun du gdab bo/ /na massa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ oM a mri todb+ha ba swAhA/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phung phul te/ de'i 'og tu sems can la yang byin
327a5(rgyud 'grel): la rol ma chags par rigs pa dang ran par bza' o/ /de nas 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la drag po gdon mi za ba'i snying pos zas kyi lhag ma'i chad bu la btab ste dbul lo/ /de'i sngags ni/ na massa man+ta badzrANSha na tra Ta a mo g+ha
327a6(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na spho ta ya hUM tra Ta ya haM maM/ gdon mi za bar drag po'i snying po'o/ /de ltar byas na de mnyes nas rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zas zos te ngal bso nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
327a7(rgyud 'grel): cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ sdig bshags la sogs pa de bzhin du bya ste dam pa'i chos kun tu dga' bar gnas so/ /de phyi dro'ang bzlas pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas nas srod dang tho rangs la dam pa'i chos la
327b1(rgyud 'grel): brtson par bya ste nam gyi gung la mal sa la bcas par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag kun gyis phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che rjes su dran par byas te/ khams stems par
327b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir nyal gyi gnyid kyi bde ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /sngar glo g.yas pas nyal na phyis ni ci bder ro/ /de nas phyi de nyid yang cho ga de bzhin du bya'o/ /de ltar sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod pas
327b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/ /ji skad bshad pa bzhin mi nus na yang ci nus pas sngags kyi lha mnyes par bya'i mi rung snyam pa'i dogs pa ni mi bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjer gzung ba dang/ bla na
327b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam gdab pa 'di gnyis ni yongs su mi gtang ngo/ /'di gnyis yongs su ma btang na cho ga gzhan rnams ma nus kyang bzlas pa rtag par brtson 'grus su byas na des kyang rjes su mthun
327b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub nges par 'thob po/ /'di la nang gi gtsang sbra gtso bo ste de bas na phyi rol gyi gtsang sbra la chags par mi bya'o/ /bza' ba 'dres pa la sogs pa nyes pa'i dogs pa yang mi bya'o/ /lus gso ba'i phyir ni
327b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gyi khrus la sogs pa yang bya ste/ de la'ang 'bab chu la sogs pa khrus byed 'dod na thog mar 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags kyis sa gtsang ma blangs te lan gsum bsngags la sngags des bdag bsrungs la chu'i 'dug ba'ang
327b7(rgyud 'grel): bskrad de mtshams bcad la sngags des chu la'ang bsngags te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang mang du phul nas yid la dran par byed cing/ sa des yang rabs kyi tshul bzhin khrus bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig la sogs
328a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya gsum po byas la chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'ang spyi bor bsam/ rdo rje go chas kyang bdag bgos la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
328a2(rgyud 'grel): chang phul te sems can la phan pa bsngags pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te ldang ngo/ /mtshams bcad pa'ang yid kyis bkrol la gnas su mi g.yeng bar 'gro'o/ /yang na khrus kyi gnas de
328a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid du snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa'o/ /nyin re zhing rjes su dran pa de ltar byas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs bsags pa dang/ go 'phang dam pa ring por mi thogs par 'thob cing tshe 'di nyid la
328a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe ba thams cad med pa dang/ mtshams ma dang bcas pa'i dngos grub thams cad nus par myur du 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma med pa zab ces te/ /dman pa rnams kyis mi lcogs pas/ /
328a5(rgyud 'grel): de phyir mtshan ma cho ga can/ /skyon med par ni 'dir bshad do/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga /slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //sarba mang+galaM laM/
